rules_text:
Job select [i](When this artifact enters, create a 1/1 colorless Hero creature token to it. Then attach this artifact to that creature.)[/i]
Equipped creature has base size 1/4, has vigilance, and is a blue Wizard in addition to its other colors and types.
Equip {1}{U} [i]({1}{U}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)[/i]
